record.title: RECOGNIZING CUBA SOLIDARITY DAY
record.narrative:
RECOGNIZING CUBA SOLIDARITY DAY -- (Senate - May 21, 2008)

[Page: S4706]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to S. Res. 573.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A resolution (S. Res. 573) recognizing Cuba Solidarity Day and the struggle of the Cuban people as they continue to fight for freedom.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the resolution.
